title: Using a Calculator to compute the area to the left (TI-83, 83+, $$84$$, 84+ Calculator)
text: Go into 2nd DISTR. --> 2:normalcdf. Follow the syntax normalcdf(lower value, upper value, mean, standard deviation)

title: Upper value
text: Use 1E99 (pressing $$1$$, the EE key (a 2nd key) and then 99) or enter $${10}^{99}$$ instead.
